maptype.helpText: This property allows you to set the map type.

viewtype.helpText: This property allows you to set the view type of the map.

locations.helpText: Set this property to a variable to populate the list of values to display.

markertype.helpText: Set this property to change the format of the location being plotted.

lat.helpText: This property can be used to set the Latitude of the location.

lng.helpText: This property can be used to set the Longitude of the location.

gradient.helpText: Set this property to a variable to set the color of gradient displayed for Heatmap.

pixeldensity.helpText: This property can be used to set the size of the marker.

opacity.helpText: This property can be used to set the appearance of the marker.

info.helpText: This property is used to set any information that needs to be displayed when the location is clicked.

icon.helpText: This property is used to set the icon to be displayed on the location.

shade.helpText: This property is used to set a circle shaped boundary around the marker.

radius.helpText: This property is used to set the radius of the boundary around the marker.

origin.helpText: This property is used to set the start point of the route to be displayed.

destination.helpText: This property is used to set the end point of the route to be displayed.

waypoints.helpText: This property is used to the mark the locations in between the route

stopover.helpText: This property is used to enable markers on the waypoints in the route

travelmode.helpText: This property is used to set the mode of travel used for plotting the route

zoom.helpText: This property is used to set the zoom level of the map

trafficlayer.helpText: This property is used to enable real-time traffic information (where supported) to your maps

transitlayer.helpText: This property is used to enable real-time local transit information (where supported) to your maps

onClick.helpText: This event handler is called upon the click of map.

onMarkerclick.helpText: This event handler is called when the marker is clicked.

onMarkerhover.helpText: This event handler is called when the marker is hovered.
